what: Irrigation Survey Data from Clemson University Extension, 1997-2000
title: Irrigation Survey Data from Clemson University Extension, 1997-2000
text: cuscirrigationsurvey R package contains survey data compiled South Carolina County Extension Agents Clemson University annually 1997-2000. data published previously Irrigation Journal (2001), cuscirrigationsurvey likely thorough compilation work available today. package author received data W. Bryan Smith, Area Extension Agent director irrigation survey efforts 1998-2000. survey conducted prior 1997, however data found made available package author. data gathered year county agents county; used combination calling large farmers referring data Farm Service Agency, others contacted farmers. dataset provides unique perspective irrigation South Carolina, still relevant today. survey effort comprehensive ever conducted, comparable data collection efforts years afterwards. Lacking comprehensive data, later reports regarding irrigation SC estimated general declines 2000 2010. recently (~2015 - ~2020), reported irrigation South Carolina increased substantially. Hypothetically, recent increase can attributed -estimated values year 2000. install package using R, first install devtools (haven’t already): , install package github:
